title: Marry a Vampire - Novel Updates
tags: Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Vampires
author: Nine Sui Wo   九穗禾
description:
When I had awakened ten years ago, I discovered that my husband was a handsome vampire…

But why did I forget everything about my past? Who will explain to me what happened in these past ten years?  In the history, was it the princess who lived in the ivory tower or the Cinderella who dropped the crystal shoe who indulged in love?>
